dr.app.seqgen
Class SequenceSimulator

java.lang.Object
  dr.app.seqgen.SequenceSimulator
Direct Known Subclasses:
GeoDiffusionSimulator, MicrosatelliteSimulator
public class SequenceSimulator
extends java.lang.Object

Class for performing random sequence generation for a given site model. Sequences for the leave nodes in the tree are returned as an alignment.

Author:
remco@cs.waikato.ac.nz

traverse

void traverse(NodeRef node,
              int[] parentSequence,
              int[] category,
              SimpleAlignment alignment)
recursively walk through the tree top down, and add sequence to alignment whenever a leave node is reached.

Parameters:
node - reference to the current node, for which we visit all children
parentSequence - randomly generated sequence of the parent node
category - array of categories for each of the sites
alignment -
